name: Update a book with invalid data

steps.name: When  I update the book with ID: 100 with New ID: 12345678910, Title: "Updated book", Description: "Long New ID", Page Count: 100, Excerpt: "test", Publish Date: "2025-04-03T00:00:00"
Then  the response status code should be 400
And  the response should contain an error message with title: "One or more validation errors occurred."
And  the response should contain value: "The JSON value could not be converted to System.Int32. Path: $.id | LineNumber: 0 | BytePositionInLine: 17." at path: "errors.'$.id'"

labels.name: story
labels.value: Update a book with invalid data

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: Update a book with invalid data

parameters.name: error_message
parameters.value: "The JSON value could not be converted to System.Int32. Path: $.id | LineNumber: 0 | BytePositionInLine: 17."

parameters.value: One or more validation errors occurred.
